fullplot: A series of overlapping stories about four suburban families dealing with different maladies. Esther Gold's life is consumed by caring for her comatose son; Jim Train is sent into a tailspin when he's passed over for a promotion; Annette Jennings' family is struggling in the wake of her divorce; Helen Christianson is determined to shake up her mundane life.

title: The Safety of Objects

tomatoes.consensus: The large cast of characters and scripting are too unwieldy, and the suburban angst theme feels tired.
